body_html:
I am worried about 1e-2 or 1e-1 tolerance, which seems too high to me.
It is possible there is a bug with the code on ppc64?

CC @Nayana-ibm who also is working on getting TF to build and run on ppc64 machines. (Big endian in their case, but maybe there is some information that could be shared.)

body:
I am worried about 1e-2 or 1e-1 tolerance, which seems too high to me.
It is possible there is a bug with the code on ppc64?

CC @Nayana-ibm who also is working on getting TF to build and run on ppc64 machines. (Big endian in their case, but maybe there is some information that could be shared.)
